#summary Installation Instructions.

= Installation =

Bites will soon be released as a free beta on one of the android application market place sites, more details will be available here when that happens.

So far Bites has only been run on an Android emulator. If you want to try it out, you can get the [http://developer.android.com/ emulator] from http://developer.android.com/ and follow the instructions there to install an application.
